title: Bug Report Master Yi
body:
Hello.

I was recently in a match vs a Master Yi jungle. Our botlane got kinda fed and everything was going well so far(expect that diana mid...). 
Then Yi came. GG. 
He won every fight. Even if we go him 3v1 he won or even made a double kill....I think sb should look up his hp and attack calculations because I think there is some kind of mistake.
And then sb should call this jayce and explain why he gets oneshottet if he goes full ad.

-m4sterm1x

P.S. : Nerf pls

replies.body:
Hmm... du magst Dota... und die Stadtpiraten?

Und ja, ich liebe demokratische Abstimmungen.

Aber an sonsten... it's not a bug, it's a feature... das ist das genau das, was Yi macht. Im Late-Late-Game wirst du keinen Champ finden, der mehr Schaden macht. Aber da hinzukommen, ist das schwierige... und sich dann von keiner Bet√§ubung treffen zu lassen...
